newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares rise in higher continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares rise in higher continuous trade.

text.p: Shares in two companies closed higher and two were flat in Warsaw bourse continuous trade. Debica did not trade. Total turnover was 0.8 million zlotys. On Thursday no shares traded.
BPH closed at 196 zlotys, one percent higher than at opening, and Elektrim closed 0.7 percent higher at 27 zlotys. Mass privatisation NFU units fell 2.2 percent to 88 zlotys.
